mapper.insert: insert into item(it_date, it_money, it_ca_num, it_content) values(#{item.it_date},#{item.it_money},#{item.it_ca_num},#{item.it_content})
mapper.select: SELECT item.*, ca_ty_name as it_ty_name, ca_name as it_ca_name FROM item JOIN category ON ca_num = it_ca_num WHERE it_date like concat(#{it_date}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET it_ca_num = #{item.it_ca_num}, it_date = #{item.it_date}, it_money = #{item.it_money}, it_content = #{item.it_content} WHERE it_num = #{item.it_num}
mapper.select: SELECT item.*, ca_ty_name as it_ty_name, ca_name as it_ca_name FROM item JOIN category ON ca_num = it_ca_num WHERE it_date like concat(#{cri.search}, '%') ORDER BY it_date desc LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
